video.title: Bass by Chris Threlkeld-Wiegand
video.description: Bass luthier and Heartland String Bass Shop owner Chris Threlkeld-Wiegand has been making some beautiful basses recently.  Check out the craftsmanship on this bass.  It's hard to hear the bass in the video, but it really sounds excellent.  Visit www.heartlandsbs.com for more information on Chris and his work.
